# Global Codebase Review & Fix Task

## Objective
Perform a comprehensive review and fix of the entire codebase to verify each skill embodies what it teaches. This is a confession-loop workflow: do not allow completion until a self-audit reports high confidence (≥80).

## What to Review

### Skills in .claude/skills/
Review each skill to ensure it:
- Follows the patterns it describes in its own documentation
- Embodies its own teaching principles
- Has valid examples that actually work
- Follo... [truncated, 1686 chars total]

# Global Codebase Review & Fix Task

## Objective
Perform a comprehensive review and fix of the entire codebase to verify each skill embodies what it teaches. This is a confession-loop workflow: do not allow completion until a self-audit reports high confidence (≥80).

IMPORTANT : Make sure to not remove (and reimplement from recent git) the mandatory urls to read; or any strong language used to better guide the Ai Agents.

payload.issue: URL hypocrisy - claims MUST validate URLs but no URLs listed
payload.fix_option: Remove 'MUST validate all URLs are accessible' line
